artist: Artist: Augustus Welby Northmore Pugin; Manufacturer: Minton and Company; Designer: Augustus Welby Northmore Pugin
creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: Bread plate, encaustic stoneware plate with relief and stencilled polychrome decoration in gothic revival style. Wheat heads form a medallion in the center and the rim bears the motto 'Waste not, want not.'
title: Bread Plate
